text: Yā pana bhikkhunī saṅghike vihāre jānaṃ pubbupagataṃ bhikkhuniṃ anupakhajja seyyaṃ kappeyya yassā sambādho bhavissati sā pakkamissatī ti etadeva paccayaṃ karitvā anaññaṃ pācittiyaṃ
edit: Yā pana bhikkhunī saṅghike vihāre jānaṃ pubbupagataṃ bhikkhuniṃ anupakhajja seyyaṃ kappeyya yassā sambādho bhavissati sā pakkamissatī ti etadeva paccayaṃ karitvā anaññaṃ pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: 112. Should any bhikkhunī knowingly lie down in a dwelling belonging to the Community so as to intrude on a bhikkhunī who arrived there first, (thinking), "Whoever finds it confining will go away" — doing it for just that reason and no other — it is to be confessed.
